channel.title: [DELTA] How do you change maximum number of shops?
channel.description:
I know this is a extremely newbie question but yeah:P Can anyone tell me how to? Would appreciate it
Thanks in advance :)

item.title: [DELTA] How do you change maximum number of shops?
item.dc:creator: @bananaman bananaman
item.description:
@bananaman wrote:

[quote=“mista pnut, post:2, topic:455594”]Not sure exactly where it is or the exact name but it’s close to something like this
public static int maxShops = xx;

probably in the shophandler or server class[/quote]

Ah thanks i found it, but when i startup my server i get this error

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 160 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:81) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:127)

Read full topic
item.source: [DELTA] How do you change maximum number of shops?
